advancement.constructionstick.root.title: Construction Sticks
advancement.constructionstick.template_r: Out with the old, in with the new
constructionstick.description.stick:
The %s can place up to %s blocks at the side of a building facing you and lasts %s.

Press the bound %s key to change placement restriction (Horizontal, Vertical, North/South, East/West, No lock).

Open the option screen with the bound %s key.

§5§nUNDO§0§r
Holding down the bound %s key while looking at a blocks will show you the last blocks you placed with a green border around them. Pressing the bound %s key while looking at any of them will undo the operation, giving you all the items back. If you used the Destruction upgrade, it will restore the blocks.

§5§nCONTAINERS§0§r
Shulker boxes, bundles and many containers from other mods can provide building blocks for the stick.

§5§nOFFHAND PRIORITY§0§r
Having blocks in your offhand will place them instead of the block you're looking at.
constructionstick.description.template_a: The angel upgrade places a block on the opposite side of the block (or row of blocks) you are facing. Maximum distance depends on stick tier. Right click empty space to place a block in midair. To do that, you'll need to have the block you want to place in your offhand.
constructionstick.description.template_b: The battery upgrade allows you to use energy instead of durability. The stick will have the ability to store energy and use it to place blocks. Warning, you can only charge the stick if you have a mod that provides a way to do so.
constructionstick.description.template_d: The destruction upgrade destroys blocks (no block entities) on the side facing you. Maximum number of blocks depends on stick tier. Destroyed blocks disappear into the void, you can use the undo feature if you've made a mistake.
constructionstick.description.template_r: The replacement upgrade allows you to exchange blocks with the block of the type you are holding in your offhand. This can be useful for replacing walls after placement.
constructionstick.description.template_u: The unbreakable upgrade allows you to place blocks without using durability. The stick will never break.
constructionstick.description.upgrade:
§5§nINSTALLATION§0§r
Put your new upgrade template together with your stick and the required item in a Smithing Table to apply (Check the Smithing Table recipes to see the required item). To switch between upgrades, press the bound %s key while holding your stick or use the option screen.
constructionstick.option.direction.targe: Place blocks with same direction as target block
constructionstick.option.lock.eastwest.d: Build a row in E/W direction on top of the original block
constructionstick.option.lock.horizontal: Build a horizontal column in front of the original block
constructionstick.option.lock.nolock.des: Extend from any side of the original block
constructionstick.option.lock.northsouth: Build a row in N/S direction on top of the original block
constructionstick.option.lock.vertical.d: Build a vertical column in front of the original block
constructionstick.option.match.exact.des: Only extend blocks that are exactly the same
constructionstick.option.random.yes.desc: Place random blocks present in your hotbar
constructionstick.option.replace.yes.des: Replace certain blocks like fluids, snow and tallgrass
constructionstick.option.upgrades.constr: Extend your building on the side facing you
Place behind blocks and in mid air
Destroys blocks on the side facing you
Replaces blocks with the block in your offhand
constructionstick.tooltip.upgrades_tip: Apply the template to your stick in the smithing table
